data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Sun, Chao, Li, Xu, Zhou, Wei, Li, Fenglian (2018): A review of Garra (Teleostei: Cypriniformes) from two rivers in West Yunnan, China with description of a new species. Zootaxa 4378 (1): 49-70, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4378.1.3|38 occurrences
